1.title: What is staking?
1.content: Staking is the process of holding and validating cryptocurrency on a blockchain to support network operations and earn rewards.

2.title: How does it work?

3.title: What is an API?
3.content: API (Application Programming Interface) is a set of protocols and tools for building software, which allows different applications to interact with each other.

4.title: How is energy calculated?
4.content: Energy is calculated based on various physical formulas, depending on the context. For example, in physics, energy can be calculated as the product of mass and the square of the speed of light (E=mc²).

С правилами стейкинга ознакомлен: I have read and agree to the staking rules
1.1. Стейкинг осуществляется на платформ: 1.1. Staking is carried out on the EcoForce platform and allows users to freeze TRX tokens to receive energy and income.
1.2. Участие в стейкинге является добров: 1.2. Participation in staking is voluntary, and the user is responsible for understanding the associated risks.
1.3. Стейкинг регулируется настоящими ус: 1.3. Staking is regulated by these terms and conditions, which the user accepts when adding tokens to staking.
2.1. Пользователь добавляет токены TRX в: 2.1. The user adds TRX tokens to staking through their personal account on the platform.
2.2. Замороженные токены TRX автоматичес: 2.2. Frozen TRX tokens automatically participate in the platform's general staking pool.
2.3. Энергия начисляется динамически и р: 2.3. Energy is accrued dynamically and calculated based on the total amount of TRX staked on the Tron network.

Для кого может быть полезен этот сервис: Who can benefit from this service
Если вы регулярно отправляете USDT или д: If you regularly send USDT or other tokens on the Tron network, this service will help significantly reduce commission costs, making transactions more profitable.
Даже небольшие вложения в стейкинг позво: Even small investments in staking will allow you to accumulate energy daily. You can use it to save on transactions or earn income by selling it back.
Для сервисов, обрабатывающих большой объ: For services processing a large volume of transactions on the Tron network, using energy through our service will reduce commission costs.
Онлайн-обменники могут арендовать энерги: Online exchangers can rent energy to optimize costs.
